about_the_game:
Helhigan was built after the final war 1000 years ago between man and machine. The city is being controlled by a AI that is designed to defend the city during emergencies and help the people thrive, combating disease and crime with advanced surveillance and healthcare. The people here live well but for how long? 

 There are a lot of people outside the safety of Helhigan hoping to find riches, become famous or just simply are enthusiast of the ruins of the old world.

 Fear the lost ones, those who fell 1000 years ago and still live in the ruins, they aren't the only enemies but the most abundant, you need to be ready for anything.

Explore the seamless endless worlds that are part of the Helhigan world.

Helhigan is a third person loot and shoot with heavy RPG mechanics.

Countless features and a long future planned for Helhigan.

short_description: The world of Helhigan was forever changed by the final war. Civilization is standing strong again but for how long? You will never be alone with the help of Golems and your friends.. Are you the hero Helhigan needs?
